external_references.description: Abdo, B., et al. (2022, April 4). FIN7 Power Hour: Adversary Archaeology and the Evolution of FIN7. Retrieved April 5, 2022.
Cocomazzi, Antonio. (2024, July 17). FIN7 Reboot | Cybercrime Gang Enhances Ops with New EDR Bypasses and Automated Attacks. Retrieved September 24, 2025.

objects.description: [FIN7](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0046) has staged legitimate software, that was trojanized to contain an Atera agent installer, on Amazon S3.(Citation: Mandiant FIN7 Apr 2022) [FIN7](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0046) has also used an open directory web server as a staging server for payloads and other tools, such as OpenSSH and 7zip.(Citation: Cocomazzi FIN7 Reboot)
